SELECT NO,ID,PW,NAME,REGDATE FROM MYBATISMEMBER WHERE ENABLED = '1' ORDER BY REGDATE DESC

SELECT * FROM mybatisMember

AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

AND ENABLED = '1' ORDER BY no DESC
